summary: TRANSMISSION WENT AT 120,000 MILES. DEALER REPAIRED FOR $3,000. CAR WAS GIVEN MULTIPOINT INSPECTION, ALL OK PER DEALER. 3 DAYS LATER MY SON WAS DRIVING, IN MOTION AND WITHOUT WARNING CAR STOPPED DEAD. TOWED TO LOCAL GARAGE, ENGINE IS SEIZED. NOT PART OF THE CURRENT RECALL. NOT REPAIRABLE EXCEPT FOR ENGINE REPLACEMENT. ALSO NOTEWORTHY IS THAT THE DEALER WROTE THE MILEAGE ON THE SERVICE RECIPET AT 98K MILES NOT 120K.
